title: Gpu ray sensor strange after upgrading from 9.8.0 to 9.9.0

content.raw:
Hi,

I wanted to point out a strange behavior of Gpu ray sensor on 9.9.0 version. The laser beams are reflected before touch in a surface. In order to illustrate, see the pictures below:

**Gazebo 9.8.0:**

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/553318228-image.png)
**Gazebo 9.9.0:**

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/2632960653-image.png)
I couldn’t have a deeper look on that, but I’ve seen some changes were made on the new release. In order to reproduce the error, it is just to run this world attached.
